step.description: Happy path: Convert a valid URL to Markdown. Assumes the server can fetch and convert the content.

result.result:
Example Domain





# Example Domain

This domain is for use in illustrative examples in documents. You may use this
domain in literature without prior coordination or asking for permission.

[More information...](https://www.iana.org/domains/example)

step.description: Happy path: Convert a local HTML file to Markdown. Ensures file reading and conversion works correctly.
Happy path: Convert a base64-encoded Data URI with HTML content to Markdown.
Happy path: Convert a base64-encoded Data URI with plain text to Markdown.

result.result: This is a simple text message

step.description: Edge case: Attempt to convert a source with an unsupported protocol (FTP), expecting a ValueError.

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: An error occurred while processing source 'ftp://invalid.protocol/test.html': File not found at path: ftp://invalid.protocol/test.html

step.description: Edge case: Attempt to convert an empty source string, expecting a ValueError.

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: The 'source' parameter cannot be empty.

step.description: Edge case: Attempt to convert a malformed Data URI with invalid base64 data, expecting a decoding error.

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: An error occurred while processing source 'data:text/html;base64,InvalidData': Failed to decode Data URI content: Incorrect padding

step.description: Edge case: Attempt to convert a non-existent local file, expecting a FileNotFoundError or ValueError.

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: An error occurred while processing source 'D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\nonexistent.html': File not found at path: D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\nonexistent.html

step.description: Security test: Attempt to access a file outside the current working directory, expecting a security error.

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: An error occurred while processing source '..\other_directory\file.html': Security error: File path '..\other_directory\file.html' is outside the allowed directory.

step.description: Edge case: Attempt to convert a URL that results in a network error, expecting a RequestException.

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Network error fetching URL 'https://thisdomaindoesnotexist12345.com': HTTPSConnectionPool(host='thisdomaindoesnotexist12345.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: / (Caused by SSLError(SSLEOFError(8, '[SSL: UNEXPECTED_EOF_WHILE_READING] EOF occurred in violation of protocol (_ssl.c:1010)')))

step.description: Edge case: Attempt to convert a source with empty content, expecting an empty Markdown result.

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: An error occurred while processing source 'data:text/html;base64,': Invalid Data URI format. Expected format: 'data:<mime_type>;base64,<data>'
